class.name: OpenXRAndroidTrackableObjectTracker
class.description: A tracker for an object (from [code]XR_ANDROID_trackables[/code]). See also [OpenXRAndroidTrackablesExtension].

method.name: get_extents
method.description: Returns the width, height, and depth, or [member Vector3.x], [member Vector3.y], and [member Vector3.z] respectively. The width, height, and depth are centered on the pose from [method OpenXRAndroidTrackableTracker.get_center_pose]. For example, a width of [code]2[/code] means the extents extend [code]1[/code] to the left and right of the center pose.

method.name: get_object_label
method.description: Return the [enum ObjectLabel] for this tracker.

constants.constant: The object is none of the other types.
The object is a computer mouse.
